also voidranged wont work to me… it works with melee

item.title: Need help quick :D
item.dc:creator: @glowindagger glowindagger
item.description:
@glowindagger wrote:

well lately ive had trouble with darkbows…
i cant seem to get the spec fixed it wont hit 49-49 or w/e
i tried to change it into this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && !specOn){ DDS2Damg3 = true; ddsInterval = 500; DDS2Damg2 = true; lastDds = System.currentTimeMillis(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ darkbow(); specialAtk(true, 75, -1, -1); //327 hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit(99)) + misc.random(99); ddsInterval = 500; actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specAttack(); usingSpecial = true; }

and no errors during the compilation

am using delta base

Read full topic
